name: Ncit-web-technology
tagline: web technology class materials for ncit by nitesh rijal
body:
### Welcome to Web Technology Class @ NCIT.
Hello World.

This is the Web Technology Class @ NCIT by Nitesh Rijal. You can download the whole repository contents as ZIP or TAR Balls. Optionally, you can browse the repository and Download/View specific lessons and materials.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
